mapper.sql: id as id, inbound_id as inboundId, upc as upc, qty as qty, line_seq as lineSeq, carton_no as cartonNo, inv_status as invStatus, inv_type as invType, batch_number as batchNumber, mfg_date as mfgDate, exp_date as expDate, country_of_origin as countryOfOrigin, inv_attr1 as invAttr1, inv_attr2 as invAttr2, inv_attr3 as invAttr3, inv_attr4 as invAttr4, inv_attr5 as invAttr5, ext_memo as extMemo, is_iqc as isIqc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wh_inbound_line ( inbound_id , upc , qty , line_seq , carton_no , inv_status , inv_type , batch_number , mfg_date , exp_date , country_of_origin , inv_attr1 , inv_attr2 , inv_attr3 , inv_attr4 , inv_attr5 , ext_memo , is_iqc ) VALUES ( #{inboundId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , #{upc,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{qty,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lineSeq,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{cartonNo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{batchNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mfgDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{expDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{countryOfOrigin,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr1,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr2,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr3,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr4,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{invAttr5,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{extMemo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isIqc,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_wh_inbound_line SET inbound_id = #{inboundId,javaType=java.lang.Long,jdbcType=BIGINT} , upc = #{upc,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , qty = #{qty,javaType=java.lang.Double,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , line_seq = #{lineSeq,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , carton_no = #{cartonNo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_status = #{invStatus,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_type = #{invType,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , batch_number = #{batchNumber,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , mfg_date = #{mfgDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , exp_date = #{expDate,javaType=java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , country_of_origin = #{countryOfOrigin,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr1 = #{invAttr1,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr2 = #{invAttr2,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr3 = #{invAttr3,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr4 = #{invAttr4,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , inv_attr5 = #{invAttr5,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , ext_memo = #{extMemo,javaType=java.lang.String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , is_iqc = #{isIqc,javaType=java.lang.Boolean,jdbcType=BIT} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select from t_wh_inbound_line where id in
